name: Saving Sedit
description:
So this is my entry into my own jam :D Believe it or not I did not anticipate doing something but the OLC Discord community kept telling me too. So I created a procedural generated exploration platform game. The objective is to find all of the collectibles in as short a time as possible, i.e. speed-run it. To help you, you enlist various members of the OLC community to help (or hinder) you.

This download is for Windows. I will release the source after the Jam and once Ive had time to make some videos about it.

Oh yeah, I can't win btw...
